name: 2. Escape.
description:
"As I drove down our little dirt road, like a hundred times before, Mum driving the Tractor ahead of me in an attempt to save it from what was coming. All I could see was red glow, all I could feel was the pressure of time. It was getting closer. We would later find out that we escaped the storm by only fifteen minutes or so. By the time we were down this road, our home was already burning behind us."

Photography by Jay Moon, during the Australian wildfires; November 2019.
#2 of 15.
All funds generated go toward the ongoing recovery.
